about_the_game:
Left Stranded is a multiplayer factory automation game set in a procedurally generated world. You are a blacksmith exiled from their kingdom and sent to an abandoned land. The only way to reclaim your place into the world is to provide weapons and tools for the kingdom.

Build

Build your factory in a procedurally generated world, build and optimize production chains using medieval technology such as waterwheels, mechanical looms, and forge-powered machines.

Resource Management

Harvest resources like iron, coal, wood, and magic-infused elements to fuel your machines and defend your land, in a procedurally generated world with dynamic day-night cycles and seasonal changes.

Automate

Start with simple hand-crafted tools and slowly progress to complex factories that combine magic and mechanics using conveyor belts, pipes and steam.

Multiplayer

Left Stranded has been designed with multiplayer in mind from the get-go. You can invite your friends to play together, or if multiplayer is not for you, you can play single player too.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM - GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4850 or Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Normal sprite resolution, Low quality compression, 1080p resolution
